folium
======

.. image:: https://github.com/python-visualization/folium/blob/main/docs/_static/folium_logo.png
   :height: 100px

Python Data, Leaflet.js Maps
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`folium` builds on the data wrangling strengths of the Python ecosystem and the
mapping strengths of the Leaflet.js library. Manipulate your data in Python,
then visualize it in a Leaflet map via `folium`.

Contributing

We love contributions!  folium is open source, built on open source,

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with this library:

This library is used to create interactive and visually appealing maps in Python using the Leaflet.js library, allowing developers to effectively visualize geospatial data. By leveraging the strengths of both Python and Leaflet.js, folium enables developers to easily manipulate their data and generate beautiful maps for various applications.
